definition: to embezzle/to defraud/to use illegitimately/to misappropriate
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Steal other accounts, forty-eighth of each deduction.
sentences.chinese: 盗用他人账户的，每次扣四十八分。

sentences.english: He is charged with embezzling Yukos's oil.
sentences.chinese: 被指控盗用尤科斯的石油。

sentences.english: He remembered instances in which defaulters had been captured.
sentences.chinese: 他想起一些盗用公款的罪犯被捉拿归案的例子。

sentences.english: The banker absconded with embezzled funds.
sentences.chinese: 那个银行家涉嫌盗用资金。

sentences.english: Most embezzlers are found out in the end.
sentences.chinese: 大多数盗用公款的人最后都被发现了。

sentences.english: IP address usurping on the campus intranet has caused great inconvenience to legal users.
sentences.chinese: 校园网IP地址的盗用给合法用户带来了很大的不便。

sentences.english: Cashier was found guilty of peculation and removed from his post.
sentences.chinese: 出纳员被发现犯了盗用公款罪便被解除了职务。

sentences.english: He left under something of a cloud, accused of misappropriating funds.
sentences.chinese: 他走了，遭到几分怀疑，被指盗用基金。

sentences.english: You're about to be killed for using the government's money, you know.
sentences.chinese: 你很快就要因盗用公款罪而被杀头了，知道吗？

sentences.english: No faker join in our vote competition.
sentences.chinese: 没有盗用者参与我们的投选比赛。

sentences.english: After years of embezzling from his employers, he was finally find out.
sentences.chinese: 在多年来盗用雇主的资金后，他终于被查出来了。

sentences.english: The cashier embezzled ＄ 50,000 from the bank.
sentences.chinese: 出纳员盗用了银行5万美元。

sentences.english: Some bastard stole my credit number to purchottom vair conditioninguum pressure cleaner?.
sentences.chinese: 某个王八蛋盗用我的信用卡号买了个吸尘器。

sentences.english: The treasurer embezzled 2000 of the club 's money.
sentences.chinese: 司库盗用了俱乐部2000英镑。

sentences.english: One of the bank's tellers has defalcated with $50,000 of the bank.
sentences.chinese: 银行中一位出纳员盗用了银行5万美元。

sentences.english: He's been accused of stealing speedboats to travel to nearby islands to plunder empty homes.
sentences.chinese: 他被指控涉嫌盗用快艇前往邻近岛屿，洗劫住宅。

definition: to use an image without permission
to plagiarize/to copy/to attack the flank or rear of an enemy
to steal (including identity theft, credit card fraud or theft of computer account)/to misappropriate
to forward (a shipment)/to reprint sth published elsewhere/Taiwan pr. [zhuan3 zai4]
to assume sb's name and take his place (idiom); to impersonate/to pose under a false name
